Barkeeper: You want to know about my customers? There are a lot of them. Lots of good people.
There is one man who sits at the bar and stays late. He does not look like a man that wants to go home. He does not have much money, but he buys drinks anyway.
There are two rowdy friends who come every day. One of them smells like garlic. They are very noisy and drink too much, but they leave before midnight.
And then there is a man who might become a new regular. He just sits in the corner alone, but he buys good drinks, so he must be respectable.
I must get back to work now. Too busy. Come back tomorrow if you want to talk more.
